description: Grafana dashboard for BunkerWeb. Must be used in combination with the Prometheus exporter PRO plugin.

targets.expr: count(count by (ip) (increase(bw_http_attacks_total{instance=~"$instance", server_name=~"$server_name"}[$__range]) > 0)) or on() vector(0)

panels.description: TOP 10 of the most attacked URLs by attackers.
panels.title: 10 most attacked URLs

panels.description: Where are attackers located around the globe.
panels.title: Worldmap attack distribution

panels.description: All details of each blocked attacks.
panels.title: List of attacks

panels.description: Error requests over time (4XX and 5XX errors).
panels.title: Error requests (4XX and 5XX)

panels.description: Standard requests over time (1XX, 2XX and 3XX status).
panels.title: Standard requests (1XX, 2XX and 3XX)

title: BunkerWeb
